bill_title: Honoring the 2003 State Champion Webster Bearcats High School football team and the students and staff involved in the football program.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2003 State Champion Webster Bearcats High School football team and the students and staff involved in the football program. WHEREAS, the 2003 Webster High School football team won the State 11B High School Football Championship by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the field. The Webster High School football team celebrated its first undefeated season since 1957 as well as its first Northeastern Conference Title outright since 1957; and WHEREAS, the Webster High School football team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership guidance from head coach Leon Breske and assistant coaches Terry Anderson and Paul Raasch; and WHEREAS, the members of the State Champion Webster Football Team for 2003 include Alan Hough, Matt Kiefer, Jacob Breske, Drew Valsvig, Blake Lynch, Brandon Steiner, Kyle Hubsch, Ryan Austin, Nick Lesnar, Eric Lesnar, Kyle Finn, Rick Schiley, Tyler Valsvig, Grayson Pirner, Jordon Peters, Brent Fosheim, Joey Bullert, Cody Paszek, Adam Dolney, Tyler Cape, Bryce Dargatz, Jason Valsvig, Justin McClurg, Greg Marx, Derek Breske, David Schiley, Brady Lesnar, Steve Hauck, Rodney Schlechter, Derek Waldner, Brandon Block, Brent Hauck, Lance Waddle, Darin Waldner, Chris Spiering, Kenny Bierschbach, Jarett Zimmerman, Trevor Dolney, Eric Wolter, Wacey Gaikowski, Justin Bierschbach, and Chris Olson; and WHEREAS, teammate Jacob Breske was named Most Valuable Player and received the Joe Robbie Award, and teammates Alan Hough, Justin Bierschbach, Nick Lesnar, Jason Valsvig, and Jacob Breske were awarded All State Honors: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Webster High School football team be commended for their excellence in athletics and academics for the 2003-2004 school year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring the 2003 State Champion Webster Bearcats High School football team and the students and staff involved in the football program. WHEREAS, the 2003 Webster High School football team won the State 11B High School Football Championship by virtue of outstanding character, sportsmanship, and dedication to excellence both on and off the field. The Webster High School football team celebrated its first undefeated season since 1957 as well as its first Northeastern Conference Title outright since 1957; and WHEREAS, the Webster High School football team received superior coaching and outstanding leadership guidance from head coach Leon Breske and assistant coaches Terry Anderson and Paul Raasch; and WHEREAS, the members of the State Champion Webster Football Team for 2003 include Alan Hough, Matt Kiefer, Jacob Breske, Drew Valsvig, Blake Lynch, Brandon Steiner, Kyle Hubsch, Ryan Austin, Nick Lesnar, Eric Lesnar, Kyle Finn, Rick Schiley, Tyler Valsvig, Grayson Pirner, Jordon Peters, Brent Fosheim, Joey Bullert, Cody Paszek, Adam Dolney, Tyler Cape, Bryce Dargatz, Jason Valsvig, Justin McClurg, Greg Marx, Derek Breske, David Schiley, Brady Lesnar, Steve Hauck, Rodney Schlechter, Derek Waldner, Brandon Block, Brent Hauck, Lance Waddle, Darin Waldner, Chris Spiering, Kenny Bierschbach, Jarett Zimmerman, Trevor Dolney, Eric Wolter, Wacey Gaikowski, Justin Bierschbach, and Chris Olson; and WHEREAS, teammate Jacob Breske was named Most Valuable Player and received the Joe Robbie Award, and teammates Alan Hough, Justin Bierschbach, Nick Lesnar, Jason Valsvig, and Jacob Breske were awarded All State Honors: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Seventy-ninth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Webster High School football team be commended for their excellence in athletics and academics for the 2003-2004 school year.
